scripts.build: babel index.js -d dist && babel ./routes/* -d ./routes/routes-babel && babel ./controllers/* -d ./controllers/controller-babel && babel ./models/* -d ./models/models-babel & babel ./middlewares/* -d ./middlewares/middlewares-babel
scripts.dev: babel index.js -d dist && babel ./routes/* -d ./routes/routes-babel && babel ./controllers/* -d ./controllers/controller-babel  && babel ./connection/* -d ./connection/connection-babel && babel ./models/* -d ./models/models-babel
